title: Classical Homeopathy  Gentle Natural Wellness
sitename: Gentle Natural Wellness with Emily Ryan, ND, MSOM, LAc
cleaned_text: gentle yet effective method that stimulates healing and balance on a deep level. The homeopathic intake looks at the complete picture of who you are to determine a remedy that addresses how you feel physically, mentally, and emotionally. Homeopathic remedies are most commonly made from plants, minerals, and sometimes animals that stimulate the body to heal itself and regain a level of balance and ease in everyday life.
